body:
Hi again Mostapha,

I´m really not familiar with the work of Chien Si in regards to bringing the OS advanced systems to Grasshopper, I read recently that OS results can now be read in GH, is Chien Si´s work related to setting up the systems directly in GH to avoid touching OS at all?

I would be happy to test drive some of Chien Si´s components and give you some feedback.

Cheers,

Alejandro
